name: places/ChIJLZ06K4ZYwokRUv82EsSW6-A
adrFormatAddress: 2200 Broadway, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: My buddy, "Zac" has won two championships from AKC at 1.5yo and groomed by "China" and has been going to Canine Styles for years... "Zac" is going on 12 years old and know as the most well groomed (Nova Scotia Duck Tolling Retriever) in Manhattan! "Zac" has modeled since he's was one year old for Chanel/Polo and Cristin Dior and groomed by China. "Zac" has gotten over 500,000 hits on Facebook and over 200,000 likes on "thedogist". He is known as "the Mayor of W. 80th St.," the most lovable likable dog on the Upper West Side.

originalText.text: We’ve been looking for a good groomer in UWS and so happy we found Canine Styles! Sue did such a nice job with our bernedoodle, and clearly treated her with care because our dog was pulling to say bye to her on the way out. Thanks Sue!!

text.text: We’ve been looking for a good groomer in UWS and so happy we found Canine Styles! Sue did such a nice job with our bernedoodle, and clearly treated her with care because our dog was pulling to say bye to her on the way out. Thanks Sue!!

originalText.text: Highly recommend for grooming! They were very accommodating of my senior Pom Benny. Benny was bathed and trimmed and looked like a stuffed animal when I picked him up. Thank you sooo much for taking care of my sweet boy!

text.text: Highly recommend for grooming! They were very accommodating of my senior Pom Benny. Benny was bathed and trimmed and looked like a stuffed animal when I picked him up. Thank you sooo much for taking care of my sweet boy!

originalText.text: The first time I went into this store my dog and I were completely ignored and when I asked for help we were treated poorly and as if we were an inconvenience. I couldn’t help but notice that the staff was catering to a certain type of person and dogs that were clearly more “designer” looking in a way (poodle/doodle looking dogs). I truly wish I were kidding as I know how ridiculous it sounds! I decided to give them a try again and the same thing happened so I scooped my dog up and walked out. I really don’t recommend going here, there are much better options nearby or even heading downtown to Dog & co. is well worth the trip if you are looking for amazing customer service and staff that will actually acknowledge you and your fur baby!

originalText.text: We visited there last Thursday, and they have charged me more than last visit(20%) and they said it is included deshedding fee (even before price deshedding was included). Btw when I came back to pick my dog, I realized they did not deshedding her at all as I still could see chunk of her hair falling from her legs, so i brought her back and told them They might forget deshedding, then they brought her back to the groomer. An hour later they called me and my dog is ready for pick up and saying”if you want deshedding please bring her earlier” lol well if they were not going to deshedding why did they charge deshedding fee at the first place?? AnywAy when I saw my dog again I was very shocked. Her thighs has hair loss that I could see her skin. I felt horrible that I brought my dog to there. I will never back to there.
